title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then never speaks another word.

author: Madeline Miller
description: A retelling of the story of Circe, a powerful witch from Greek mythology.

description: A novel about the complex relationship between two young people navigating their lives in a small town.

author: Oscar Wilde
description: A Gothic novel about a young man who remains eternally youthful while his portrait ages, reflecting his moral decay.

author: Margaret Atwood

author: George Orwell

description: A novel about a group of working-class teenagers who clash with wealthier kids in the 1960s.

author: Stephen King
description: A horror novel about a man who becomes possessed by supernatural forces while staying in a haunted hotel.
